name: Baby Breakout!
description:
Baby Breakout is a 2-4 player, 2D local multiplayer party game! Get together with your friends and take the role of 4 babies escaping from their playpen prison to get cookies. Build a tower of toys and climb your way out, or destroy your rival's favourite toys, how do you want to breakout?

Requires:
PC
2-4 Playstation 4 Controllers
Friends (or enemies)

Optional:
COOKIES!
